standard__company_tags.title: Tags

standard__company_timezone.description: Timezone of the contact. This is a string representing the timezone like 'America/New_York'.
standard__company_timezone.title: Timezone

standard__company_utm_campaign.description: The campaign of the UTM parameters for the company. E.g. 'summer_sale', 'winter_sale', 'spring_sale', 'fall_sale', 'black_friday', 'cyber_monday', 'christmas', 'new_year', 'valentines', 'easter', 'mothers_day', 'fathers_day', 'back_to_school', 'halloween', 'thanksgiving', 'other'
standard__company_utm_campaign.title: UTM Campaign

standard__company_utm_content.description: The content of the UTM parameters for the company. E.g. 'banner', 'sidebar', 'footer', 'header', 'popup', 'overlay', 'slider', 'carousel', 'video', 'audio', 'image', 'text', 'cta', 'form', 'other'
standard__company_utm_content.title: UTM Content

standard__company_utm_medium.description: The medium of the UTM parameters for the company. E.g. 'cpc', 'email', 'social', 'organic', 'referral', 'affiliate', 'display', 'video', 'audio', 'sms', 'direct', 'other'
standard__company_utm_medium.title: UTM Medium

standard__company_utm_source.description: The source of the UTM parameters for the company. E.g. 'google', 'facebook', 'twitter', 'linkedin', 'instagram', 'pinterest', 'youtube', 'tiktok', 'snapchat', 'whatsapp', 'messenger', 'email', 'sms', 'direct', 'other'
standard__company_utm_source.title: UTM Source

standard__company_utm_term.description: The term of the UTM parameters for the company. E.g. 'running+shoes', 'black+friday+sale', 'cyber+monday+sale', 'christmas+gifts', 'new+year+resolutions', 'valentines+gifts', 'easter+sale', 'mothers+day+gifts', 'fathers+day+gifts', 'back+to+school+sale', 'halloween+sale', 'thanksgiving+sale', 'other'
standard__company_utm_term.title: UTM Term

standard__company_website_desktop_speed.description: How long it takes to load the company's website on desktop.
standard__company_website_desktop_speed.title: Website desktop speed

standard__company_website_grade.title: Website grade

standard__company_website_mobile_speed.description: How long it takes to load the company's website on mobile.
standard__company_website_mobile_speed.title: Website mobile speed

standard__company_website_phone_present.title: Website has phone number

standard__company_website_physical_addre.title: Website has physical address

standard__company_website_video_present.title: Website has video

standard__company_x_total_number_of_post.description: Total number of posts made on X.
standard__company_x_total_number_of_post.title: Total number of X posts

system__company_external_id.description: External identifier for the record, optional
system__company_external_id.title: External ID

system__company_group_id.description: Market ID for the record, optional. Used for grouping records together, and authorization where users are restricted to selected markets.
system__company_group_id.title: Market ID

system__company_last_activity_date.title: Last activity date
